posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: My first blog
posts.text: About meI received my B.S. degree in computer science and technology from Qingdao Agricultural University in 2019. Now I am pursuing my Master degree in School of Cyber Engineering, Xidian University. My research interests cover in-vehicle network security and deep learning. NewsNone Professional ProjectsVehicleEIDS 2021/6/3· A vehicle external intrusion detection system is designed, and the accuracy is as high as 97%.· It works for all vehicles and doesn’t need to change the existing environment. Selected PublicationsVehicleEIDS: A Novel External Intrusion Detection System Based on Vehicle Voltage SignalsYijie Xun, Yilin Zhao, Jiajia Liu, IEEE Internet of Things Journal, 2021 Honors and Awards
